channel.title: R Ubuntu Blog
channel.description: Recent content on R Ubuntu Blog

item.title: About
item.description:
This website is dedicated to R and Ubuntu. Mainly, it will be about how to install R in Ubuntu, notes about the c2d4u PPA I maintain, building R related packages on Ubuntu, and using R in general.

About Me

I am currently the Associate Director of the School of Science at Penn State Behrend and an Associate Professor of Statistics. I have been building R packages for Ubuntu for a very long time, since 2007.

If you have any questions or suggestions, contact me on Twitter.

item.title: Contact
item.description:
<div class="pure-u-1 pure-u-md-1-3">
    <label for="last-name">Last Name</label>
    <input id="last-name" class="pure-u-23-24" type="text">
  </div>

  <div class="pure-u-1 pure-u-md-1-3">
    <label for="email">E-Mail</label>
    <input id="email" class="pure-u-23-24" type="email" required>
  </div>

  <div class="pure-u-1 pure-u-md-1-3">
    <label for="city">City</label>
    <input id="city" class="pure-u-23-24" type="text">
  </div>

  <div class="pure-u-1 pure-u-md-1-3">
    <label for="state">State</label>
    <select id="state" class="pure-input-1-2">
      <option>AL</option>
      <option>CA</option>
      <option>IL</option>
    </select>
  </div>
</div>
<fieldset class="pure-group">
  <input type="text" class="pure-input-1-2" placeholder="A title">
  <textarea class="pure-input-1-2" placeholder="Your message"></textarea>
</fieldset>
<button type="submit" class="pure-button pure-button-primary">Send</button>
